CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of this new building block , we have designed and synthesized a series of new conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit benzodithiophene or electron - deficient unit bithiazole or benzothiadiazole and homopolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit benzodithiophene |
| conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit bithiazole |
| conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit benzothiadiazole |
| homopolymers |
| electron - rich unit benzodithiophene |
| electron - rich unit bithiazole |
| electron - rich unit benzothiadiazole |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit benzodithiophene |
| conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit bithiazole |
| conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit benzothiadiazole |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names, as they refer to specific types of polymers or units used in the synthesis of polymers.
